title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
descriptions:
Meet your new one-swipe eye upgrade. Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte delivers rich, highly pigmented color in a soft light taupe-pink that flatters every eye look—from barely-there daytime definition to chic, modern matte glam.

Why you’ll love it:
- Cream-to-powder magic: Glides on silky, sets to a soft-focus matte that won’t budge.
- All-day performance: Waterproof and crease-proof for color that stays fresh from morning to midnight.
- Skin-loving ingredients: Vitamin C and E plus candelilla wax nourish, hydrate, and protect with antioxidant care, helping improve skin tone and texture over time.
- Zero tools needed: Built-in smudger and finger-friendly formula make blending effortless—just sweep, smudge, and go before the formula sets.
- Your finish, your way: Explore 30 shades across Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic to mix, match, and layer.

Perfect for sensitive, delicate skin and busy routines, Putty Matte is the ultra-wearable neutral that brightens, defines, and elevates with a swipe. No fallout, no creasing, no fuss—just smooth, modern color that stays put and looks polished all day. Swipe it on, smudge to perfection, and own your effortless eye look.
